creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text:
I'm trying to build a ant-script that puts a package onto a FTP-Server and then
adjusts the file-permissions. I also would like to adjust the properties of some
directories on the FTP-Server.

It seems the current implementation of the FTP-Task is not able to adjust
permissions of directories on the FTP-Server. I tried to create a ftp-task with
an included fileset that selects directories as well, but the FTP-Task always
only performs the chmod on files.

Also if I use the "chmod" attribute of the FTP-Task while using the "send"
action, only the files are assigned the desired permissions, the directories are
always created with "755"

I know this one is way older, but it seems the newer one might get resolved someday.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 50218 ***
